title: Interpretation of seeing the dead over the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The most accurate interpretations of seeing the dead speaking to the living in a dream. Interpretation of the dead seeing the living in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing the dead accusing the living? What did the jurists explain in a dream about hurtful words coming from the dead to the living? Seeing the deceased warns the dreamer of something worthy of interpretation or simply learn the secrets of this vision through the paragraphs below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. The words of a living dead person in a dream. If the fortuneteller sees in a dream a dead person talking to him, then the vision is interpreted according to the content of the speech, as follows: Words of warning: When the deceased addresses the fortuneteller in a dream and warns him about anything in his life, then this warning is real and the words of the deceased It is true because he is in the abode of truth, and the dreamer should not ignore these warnings that he heard from the dead, and they were before his eyes all the time. Positive speech: One of the most beautiful symbols that appear in dreams is seeing the dead speaking to the dreamer and announcing victories, the arrival of happiness, recovery from diseases, and words. Others calm hearts and give positive energy to people and all that. He said in a dream that the good tidings will come true soon, God willing. Hints and Advice: The deceased can be seen in a dream to advise the dreamer to take care of the teachings of religion and stay away from dangers and sins, and the dead father can be seen giving life advice to the dreamer to live the world without difficulty or hardship, keeping in mind that the advice Which the dreamer heard from the deceased in a dream is mandatory to be implemented in reality. Words of reproach and disapproval: If the dead person appears in a dream while he is disturbed, and speaks in the speech in a tone of reproach and rebuke, then the vision means the dreamer’s crooked behavior and the need to reform himself and his behavior so that you do not see him dying while he is angry in the dream. Many other dreams. The words of the dead to the living in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing the dead is like a sea full of many and varied details, and we will summarize the interpretation of seeing the words of the dead to the living in a dream in the following points: When the deceased speaks to someone who lives in a dream in a beautiful and comfortable place, and it is The two parties are in a state of harmony and happiness, as this is evidence of the dreamer’s long life and the abundance of happy events that change his sadness. The outlook on life, in addition to the feeling of security and comfort as a result of getting rid of distress and alleviating worries. If the dreamer saw that he was sitting with the deceased at the dining table and the dream was filled with an atmosphere of happiness, in addition to the taste of the food that the dreamer ate with the deceased was beautiful and delicious, then these are signs of stability, Abundance of money and increased livelihood. If the words that the deceased addressed to the dreamer in a dream were verses from the Holy Qur’an, then this scene is interpreted according to the verse that was spoken in the dream and is it promising or warning? Dream that you smile at the dreamer and say to him (And your Lord will please you, and you will be satisfied), and the dream shows blessings, strength, and many rewards that the dreamer will enjoy in his life after a long journey of distress and poverty. Speech of a living dead person in a dream for an unmarried woman. An unmarried woman, if her deceased father warns her,

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking to the groom’s wedding in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about walking in the groom’s wedding in a dream If you want to know the interpretation of the dream of walking in the groom’s wedding in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations that the site explains, citing the interpretations of some diligent scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream Walking to the groom’s wedding in a dreamIf one saw that he was walking to the groom’s wedding, this may indicate that the owner of this world is far from the blessed and Almighty God, and he must repent and come closer to God. Upon entering the groom’s wedding, there was a song and dance that could It indicates the worries and misfortunes that the visionary may face in his life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was in the groom’s wedding, it could indicate that the dreamer will be far from the good things he did and must correct his fate. Walking in the wedding may indicate The groom’s wedding in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to go to a new job or the positive changes that occur in his life during this period and he needs to ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about walking among green trees in a dream: In the event that one sees that he is walking among green trees, this may indicate The enormous livelihood that the dreamer enjoyed at that time. Walking among the green trees in a dream, we may find that the person has gotten rid of many of the problems that he was suffering from at that time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking among the green trees, it means This indicates the goodness that is coming for him and the positive changes that will occur in his life at that time. A dream about walking among green trees in a dream may indicate a woman’s upcoming pregnancy or good changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking by crawling in a dream In the case of his personal opinion that he was crawling, this may indicate his need to seek knowledge at that time. Crawling in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has to go for Hajj or Umrah during those days. Walking in a dream could indicate hypocrisy in religion or deception and hypocrisy. Whoever sees in his dream that he is crawling on the ground, it may indicate his distance from God Almighty, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about walking with a work colleague in a dream: In the event that someone saw that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate a project A new dream is entered into by the dreamer in this period. Walking with a colleague in a dream can indicate success at work and completion of tasks. If a person sees that he was walking with his colleague, this may indicate that he is an enthusiastic person who wants to continue his work all the time. Whoever sees in his dream That he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate getting rid of the stress and anxiety that he suffered from in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches walking on the body in a dream: In the event that someone sees cockroaches walking on his body, this may indicate the presence Enemies surround him at that time and he must be careful. Cockroaches walking on the body in a dream may indicate envy.

title: A gift from the dead in a dream

preview.html: Some people believe that a gift from the dead brings them a bad omen, and this depends on the type of gift, and this we will explain to you in the following lines from our translator. Interpretation of seeing a gift from the dead in a dream for a single girl: Imam Al-Sadiq says that the gift of the dead in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her engagement soon. And if it is If she is engaged, then the dream tells her that her marriage is imminent, and God knows best. A dead mother’s gift to an unmarried girl in a dream portends her exit from the stage of distress. Loneliness, loss of worry and depression from her life, and the fulfillment of wishes, God willing. When a dead mother appeared in a dream carrying gifts for her daughter, the dreamer was happy and smiling. This is an expression of the daughter’s longing for her mother, and her intense need for her. If an unmarried girl sees her father dead in her dream, this gives her a closed or unclear gift. It is good news for making her dreams come true and achieving her goals soon. If she sees her friend or sister deceased, she will be presented with A long dress as a gift in a dream. It is a sign that his coming days are full of success and achievement, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person sleeping in bed. Interpretation of seeing a gift from the dead in a dream for a married woman. Imam Al-Sadiq says: The gift of a dead person in a married woman’s dream has more than one meaning. Each of them differs depending on the dreamer’s deceased relative and the type of gift as well. If she sees her father or brother in a dream giving her a gift, it still hurts her that she abandoned him. She feels very lonely after him, and always prays for mercy and forgiveness. When you see in your dream a married woman as if she were her mother or sister She is the one who gives her a gift of gold, so she is in the dream. Soon good news is that she will be pregnant and the fetus will be a male, and God knows best. If the dead person’s gift in the dream is clothes, it is evidence of concealment and purity in this world and the afterlife. And whoever sees a dead person giving her a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, this expresses The goodness of her religion and the strength of her faith. Receiving food and drink from the dead as a gift in a dream. Evidence of the abundance of sustenance, the increase in goodness, the blessing of the home, and the goodness of the children, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a gift from the dead in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a gift from the dead in a dream indicates the presence of a man, according to Ibn Sirin. It is a harbinger of happiness, joy, and the coming of relief, and the dreamer must be optimistic about this dream and know that the future is more beautiful. When a man sees a dead person in a dream, he gives him some money. It is an unpleasant vision that expresses worry, anxiety, and distress, whether the money is of paper or metal. If the dead person gives the dreamer new clothes in the dream, then this is good news of comfort and an increase in blessings in his life, and God knows best. But if the clothes are old, worn out, or torn, then it is a sign of his increasing burdens, responsibilities, and the accumulation of debts on him, and God knows best. The dead person’s gift to the living in a dream if it is something other than Desirable or forbidden, such as wine or raw meat. It expresses the dreamer’s misguidance and seriousness about his money and health, and God knows best. Read also: Dreaming of dead bread, the meaning of seeing a gift from the dead in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Imam Al-Sadiq says if the dead person offers food

title: Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing happiness through the site Roy2a.com, happiness is an internal feeling due to the pleasure of things that a person feels and its return in the form of a smiling face or a rapid heartbeat, whether it is hearing happy news or something happening to a person or others. A person sees in his dream a feeling of happiness, wakes up and wonders whether it means that he will see something good or not, and for this we will present the most important interpretations provided by the great interpreters of dreams, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn. Shaheen, follow us until. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream Feeling happy in a dream is one of the good dreams that indicate the good mood of the dreamer and his feeling of satisfaction. Seeing happiness in a dream With the dreamer in a noisy place with songs and instruments, there are obstacles and anxiety in the life of the viewer. Seeing happiness in a dream To achieve the goals that the viewer seeks. It may be a reason to see happiness in a dream It is a reflection of a situation that simplifies the dreamer before sleeping, so the dream came as an interpretation of what is happening in his subconscious. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing happiness in a dream For the person concerned is an indication of the end of his anxiety soon. Seeing hearing news in a dream Make the fortune teller happy to appear and food comes to him. Seeing happiness in a dream To feel inner peace and comfort. Seeing happiness in a dream King For the patient to recover. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream for a single woman Seeing happiness in a single woman's dream is an indication of her good luck and good tidings coming her way. When a girl sees, one of her family members, feeling happy in her dream indicates that she is a good girl with them and that they are satisfied with her. If the girl sees the man she wants in a dream, she Feeling happy is an indication that God will bring them together in the near future. Seeing happiness for a girl is an indication of the success, excellence and achievements she has achieved in her life and will be happy with them. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing the distribution of an invitation to joy or marriage in a dream Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream for a married woman Seeing feeling happy in a married woman's dream is a sign of the departure of sadness and distress from her, and her circumstances will change for the better. Seeing a happy husband in a married woman's dream indicates that they will hear good news that will make them happy, such as pregnancy news. If a married woman sees people happy in her dream, it is a sign of the arrival of good news, food and happiness. Seeing a suitable place in the house for a married woman and she was happy is a sign of success, success and happiness that she and her family will capture. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing happiness in a pregnant woman's dream is an indication of her comfort in pregnancy and the ease of her birth. Seeing the husband telling the pregnant woman good news makes her happy to announce that the gender of her fetus will be male. Seeing happiness in a dream indicates that a pregnant woman will soon come to happiness, livelihood and joy. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream for a man Seeing happiness for a man in a dream is an achievement that he will achieve in his life, whether personal

When seeing a girl, a member of her family, feeling happy in her dream, indicate that she is a good girl with them and that they are satisfied with her. If the girl sees the man she wants in a dream, she feels happy. It is an indication that God will bring them together in the near future. Seeing happiness for the girl is a signification On the success, excellence, and achievements she has achieved in her life and she will be happy with them. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing an invitation to joy or marriage distributed in a dream. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a feeling of happiness in a married woman’s dream is a sign that sadness and distress will leave her, and her circumstances will change for the better. Seeing a husband indicates Happy in a married dream: They will hear good news that makes them happy, such as pregnancy news. If a married woman sees people happy in her dream, it is a sign of the arrival of good news, food and happiness. Seeing a suitable event in the home for a married woman and she was happy is a sign of success, success and happiness that she and her family will gain. Interpretation of seeing happiness in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing happiness in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of her comfort in pregnancy and the ease of her birth. Seeing the husband telling the pregnant woman good news. She is happy to announce that the sex of her fetus will be male. Seeing happiness in a dream indicates the presence of a pregnant woman, indicating the arrival of happiness, livelihood and joys soon. Interpretation Seeing happiness in a man’s dream Seeing happiness in a man’s dream is an achievement that he will achieve in his life, whether it is personal

title: What is the interpretation of my dream about cutting my hair and its effect on the viewer?

preview.html: Interpretation: I dreamed that I was cutting my hair, and there is no doubt that many girls resort to cutting their hair in order to change their minds for the sake of beautification, as hair is certainly a women’s decoration, but it is different when a girl or woman sees in a dream that she is cutting her hair, so we will provide you with all of them. Dear visitors, spare you the trouble of searching websites for the interpretation of dreams, and we will now show you all of them on the site. Various articles entitled Interpretation of dreams that I cut my hair. Interpretation of dreams that I cut my hair for an unmarried girl according to Ibn Sirin. She is satisfied with her appearance and that she is worried about something in her life or that she may suffer from some health problems for this girl or her disturbance in certain situations in her life. Interpretation of dreams about cutting my hair for an unmarried girl according to Ibn Sirin, who says if her hair was long and beautiful and she cut it, this may indicate the loss of a loved one, such as breaking off an engagement with her fiancé. But if she saw An unmarried girl had her hair cut and she did not know it. This is evidence of the approaching date of this girl’s marriage, engagement, or success at work or study. Interpretation of dreams that I cut my hair in a dream For a man, this means that if he cuts his hair a lot and has no hair, this indicates that this man has been exposed to poverty, illness, or has major problems with his wife. Or one of his children. A man’s dream of cutting his hair to the point of baldness may explain that he is a generous man with his wife and children or with his friends. title: Interpretation of seeing the husband’s mother in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the husband’s mother in a married woman’s dream. The husband’s mother is the husband’s mother, and some girls in those days suffer from many worsening problems among themselves as a result of the husband’s mother’s interference in many of their private affairs, while others are united by intimacy and intense love. In this article, we go through together the most important things that have been said about seeing the husband’s mother, so follow us. Seeing the husband’s mother in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her husband’s mother in a dream and is satisfied with her and laughs, this gives her many good tidings that will come. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream her mother-in-law hugging her And she exchanges her love, it means that she is like this in reality and in a quiet life living with her husband’s family. When the dreamer sees in a dream, the husband’s mother is arguing with her, it symbolizes peace and the quiet married life that she will enjoy. As for the dreamer seeing in a dream, the dead mother-in-law, The frowning face symbolizes the many problems and troubles that he will be exposed to that may lead to separation. Also, seeing a woman in a dream, her husband’s mother, accepting and empathizing with her, indicates a good relationship between them, and affection and intense love for her. Seeing the husband’s mother in a dream with Ibn Sirin’s wife Married woman: The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the husband’s mother in a dream indicates marital happiness and enjoyment of many blessings that will come to her. And if the fortuneteller sees her mother-in-law dead in a dream and she is happy, then he announces to her the positive changes that will happen to her soon. As for the dreamer to see his wife’s mother Looking at her gently in a dream, this indicates the soonest date for her husband to assume a high position in the coming days. And for the dreamer to see in a dream the husband’s mother accepting and embracing her, means the good luck she will have in the coming days. Also, seeing her mother-in-law sad and not smiling at her is a sign A warning about the need to stay away from sins and return to God. The dreamer seeing in a dream the husband’s mother arguing with her violently shows the security and happiness he is experiencing at that time and a happy married life. Seeing the husband’s mother in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees her husband’s mother in a dream, This means that she will get rid of the problems and fears that she is going through at that time. If the dreamer sees her mother-in-law in a dream, this indicates an easy and trouble-free birth. Also, seeing the husband’s mother in a dream indicates that the time of birth is approaching, and she will be free of problems and will pass easily. If you see your husband’s mother frowning in a dream, this means that you are suffering from severe stress and are going through difficult health crises. When a woman sees her husband’s mother angry in a dream, this indicates that she is subjected to extreme exhaustion and suffering from difficulties. What is the interpretation of seeing my deceased husband’s mother in a dream? Scientists say Interpretation: It is safe to see the deceased mother-in-law, and this will lead to many good things that will come to her in the coming days. If the dreamer sees her mother-in-law in a dream, this indicates the blessing that will come to her in the coming days.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother bringing a son to Ibn Sirin and great scholars

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about my mother being lost in the son conveys many meanings and symbols in the world of visions, especially since it is a reflection of what is happening in the mind of the dreamer, whether desires, desires, or just dreams, so we will present in the following lines what is the interpretation and that scholars have presented in it, for example, without limitation. Interpretation of a dream about a mother: A dream about a mother visiting a boy indicates the dreamer’s difficult days, tight hours, and distress that he feels, so he should pray to overcome this sadness. The meaning, if you give birth without being pregnant, includes a sign that the circumstances of this family will improve and end with security and peace of mind. The birth of a child An unhealthy paralysis of its mother is an indication of the diseases that the dreamer suffers from and the severe pain that he feels, and therefore he must ask God for forgiveness for his condition. A deformed newborn in a woman’s dream is also seen as evidence of the exposure of tsifliki, slander and false statements from others, so it should be Be careful and know that God does not oppress slaves. Interpretation of my mother’s dream that she brought a son to Ibn Sirin. The dream, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, indicates the problems and quarrels that pervaded his life, but soon the situation will stabilize and things will return to normal. My mother’s dream that she visited a son by Ibn Sirin, was beautiful. Form and body, it expresses what brings him great satisfaction and great strength. An old mother giving birth to a child in a dream symbolizes a good heir and the achievement of any goal and purpose. The meaning also refers to the obstacles that the fortuneteller is exposed to, and to the matters that disrupt his life, and the presence of those around him who help him And it strengthens it. The interpretation of my mother’s dream when she was married to a boy. The meaning suggests the tragedy that this woman is going through or the predicament she is experiencing and her need for her children to overcome this unfortunate situation. My mother’s dream about her giving birth to a married child is an indication of the ease of childbirth that she is going through, without health problems or risks. From From another point of view, the dream carries a sign of upcoming joys, stability, and happy circumstances that will come true. The interpretation of my mother’s dream is that she gave birth to a boy while she was pregnant. My mother’s dream of traveling with a child during pregnancy is an indication of many blessings and joys that will come to the dreamer. The interpretation also includes a metaphor about his inheritance from her in the near future. And God knows best. The concept refers to the burdens that this mother bears and the crises that she suffers from and that she cannot bear. The girl’s dream is a sign of her strong relationship with her mother and her strong attachment to her. The woman’s interpretation is evidence of the care and attention the mother needs. The interpretation of my mother’s dream is that she gave birth to a boy while she is divorced. It expresses My mother’s dream of visiting the boy during separation expresses her intention to enter into a new marriage to compensate for the emotional deprivation she felt with her ex-husband. The meaning also symbolizes the neglect she feels on the part of her children and her need for more psychological discipline and support from them. The birth of a child from a divorced mother is a sign of New developments that will change the course of her life. The dream shows that he has overcome all the adversities and hardships that he is going through. Interpretation of my mother’s dream that she brought a boy to a man. My mother’s dream of traveling with a boy for a man is a sign of his good fortune and a great relationship

title: Interpretation of a dream about burning my husband in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about burning my husband in a dream can be a sign of a crisis. Financial, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees her husband burning, this may lead to a financial crisis, and God knows best. When a married woman sees someone burning in a dream, this may be a sign that she is getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also indicate good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my son. Burning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my son burning in a dream. Burning a person could be a sign of achieving status, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a person burning, this may push him to achieve a high status, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees someone burning from his head to the rest of his body, this may indicate On repentance, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the burning of his left hand, he may express his inability to achieve his goals, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burning my mother in a dream. When you see a relative burning, this may indicate a high status, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the burning of someone he knows and has no relationship with, this may be a sign of suffering, but it will end, God willing. If a married woman sees her sister burning in a dream, this may mean that she has reached a prominent position, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees his relative burning in a dream He can express kindness and attain a status of prestige, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about burning my wife in a dream. title: Interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream and yellow clothes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a person wearing a yellow, light, light, golden color, dress, shirt, in a dream: an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a single woman, and a married man, according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing the color yellow in a dream Seeing colors has many meanings, as Their vision varies depending on the person who sees it, a single or married man or woman, and each color has a different meaning from the other, while we see it in a dream. We will refer throughout this article to the interpretation of seeing the color yellow in the dream of a single, married, or pregnant man or woman. Interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream for a son Sirin The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the yellow color itself has many colors whose meanings differ from each other, that is, there is a bright yellow color, which is a bright golden color, and there is a pale yellow color similar to its color. The face of the sick person. Accordingly, a person seeing bright yellow and bright golden color in a dream is an indicator and good news of happy news, abundant goodness, comfort in life, a dignified and happy life, and the spread of joy in this person’s environment. Relationships, whether family or work. As for a person who sees a pale yellow color in his dream, this warns the dreamer of the need to take care of his health, follow proper behaviors, and abstain from bad habits that afflict that person with diseases, God forbid, and pale yellow. . The color also indicates family disagreements and conflicts. Seeing the color yellow in a man’s dream. The bright golden yellow color in a man’s dream is a strong indication of the arrival of goodness and abundance, while seeing a man in his dream wearing faded yellow clothes is a warning of the arrival of worries, anxiety, illness, and falling into an inevitable series of crises. God. Seeing the color yellow in one dream. We agreed that there are two signs of seeing the color yellow in a dream, the first of which is that the golden yellow color is bright and shiny, and the second is that this yellow color is dull. Excellent and bright in her work or study environment. As for a single woman who sees a light yellow color in her dream, this indicates that there is something bothering her that may be related to her emotional or family life. Regarding the accumulation of the number of psychological attacks that she has been exposed to in the past, seeing the color yellow in a married woman’s dream. As for a married woman who sees the color yellow in her dream and its color is bright yellow, this portends a happy life and a dignified life, especially if the married woman sees the color yellow in some of her personal items, such as her bag, clothes, or Her shoes, for example. As for a married woman who sees the color yellow in her dream as if it is weak, this is not good, as it may portend the approaching illness, God forbid, or falling into a financial crisis or other matters. Seeing the color yellow in a pregnant woman’s dream is that seeing the color Bright golden yellow in a pregnant woman's dream is a good omen for her because it is a sign that her cherished desires will be fulfilled and it is an indication that her pregnancy will end with good relations if she sees it. In her clothes or possessions, the interpretation is the opposite if the color she saw was yellow

Interpretation of seeing the color yellow in a dream for a son Sirin The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the yellow color itself has many colors whose meanings differ from each other, that is, there is a bright yellow color, which is a bright golden color, and there is a pale yellow color similar to its color. The face of the sick person. Accordingly, a person seeing bright yellow and bright golden color in a dream is an indicator and good news of happy news, abundant goodness, comfort in life, a dignified and happy life, and the spread of joy in this person’s environment. Relationships, whether family or work. As for a person who sees a pale yellow color in his dream, this warns the dreamer of the need to take care of his health, follow proper behaviors, and abstain from bad habits that afflict that person with diseases, God forbid, and pale yellow. . The color also indicates family disagreements and conflicts. Seeing the color yellow in a man’s dream. The bright golden yellow color in a man’s dream is a strong indication of the arrival of goodness and abundance, while seeing a man in his dream wearing faded yellow clothes is a warning of the arrival of worries, anxiety, illness, and falling into an inevitable series of crises. God. Seeing the color yellow in one dream. We agreed that there are two signs of seeing the color yellow in a dream, the first of which is that the golden yellow color is bright and shiny, and the second is that this yellow color is dull. Excellent and bright in her work or study environment. As for a single woman who sees a light yellow color in her dream, this indicates that there is something bothering her that may be related to her emotional or family life. Regarding the accumulation of the number of psychological attacks that she has been exposed to in the past, seeing the color yellow in a married woman’s dream. As for a married woman who sees the color yellow in her dream and its color is bright yellow, this portends a happy life and a dignified life, especially if the married woman sees the color yellow in some of her personal items, such as her bag, clothes, or Her shoes, for example. As for a married woman who sees the color yellow in her dream as if it is weak, this is not good, as it may portend the approaching illness, God forbid, or falling into a financial crisis or other matters. Seeing the color yellow in a pregnant woman’s dream is that seeing the color Bright golden yellow in a pregnant woman's dream is a good omen for her because it is a sign that her cherished desires will be fulfilled and it is an indication that her pregnancy will end with good relations if she sees it. In her clothes or possessions, the interpretation is the opposite if the color she saw was yellow
